data.details: Resolution: A 4K Ultra HD TV has a resolution of 3840 x 2160 pixels. This is four times the resolution of a Full HD TV (1920 x 1080 pixels).HDR: High Dynamic Range (HDR) is a technology that improves the contrast ratio of a TV. This means that whites will be brighter and blacks will be darker, resulting in a more realistic picture. Not all 4K Ultra HD TVs support HDR, so be sure to check if this is an important feature for you. Smart TV: A smart TV has a built-in internet connection that allows you to stream movies, TV shows, and music. You can also use a smart TV to browse the web, check social media, and play games.

data.details: Queen-size bed frames are designed to fit a standard queen-size mattress, which measures 60 inches wide by 80 inches long. This makes it ideal for layering or wearing on its own on chilly days.Breathable Fabric: Cashmere allows your skin to breathe, preventing overheating and ensuring comfortable wear throughout the day.

data.description: High-waisted and relachxed-fit mom jeans, a current fashion staple. Flattering and comfortable for everyday wear.Trendy mom jeans are a relaxed-fit style that blends comfort and fashion.
data.details: Confidence Booster:  The high waist can offer a confidence boost by smoothing your tummy and creating a more defined waist.Unlike the baggy mom jeans of the 90s, trendy mom jeans offer a more flattering silhouette.  They have a high waist that sits at your natural waistline or slightly above, and relaxed fit through the hips and thighs.

data.name: Statement Earrings
data.description: A pair of eye-catching earrings that will add personality to any outfit. Available in various styles and colors.Statement earrings are all about adding personality and drama to your outfit. They come in a wide variety of styles, sizes, and colors, making them perfect for any occasion where you want to stand out.
data.details: They can be large, oversized, or feature unique shapes, colors, and textures that turn heads.prefer classic pearls

data.name: Minimalist Watch
data.description: A sleek and sophisticated watch with a clean design. Perfect for everyday wear or dressier occasions.A minimalist watch is the epitome of pared-back sophistication. It shuns unnecessary elements, focusing on clean lines, functionality, and timeless design.
data.details: Durable Materials:  Minimalist watches are often crafted from high-quality materials like stainless steel, titanium, or even ceramic. Versatility and Style:  The beauty of a minimalist watch lies in its versatility.

data.name: Designer Sunglasses
data.description: A pair of stylish sunglasses from a renowned designer. Exact details and starting bid will be confirmed upon inspection.Designer sunglasses are not just for protecting your eyes from the sun's harmful rays, they are a fashion statement that can elevate your outfit and make you look polished.
data.details: They are crafted from high-quality materials, with superior lenses that provide excellent UV protection.

data.name: Cozy Knit Scarf
data.description: A warm and comfortable knit scarf, perfect for adding a touch of style and warmth during colder weather.A cozy knit scarf is the ultimate winter accessory, offering both warmth and effortless style. It's a versatile piece that can instantly elevate your outfit and add a touch of cozy charm.
data.details: Beyond warmth and style, knit scarves can also serve a functional purpose.  On a particularly windy day, you can pull the scarf up to cover your lower face for added protection.  They can also be used as a makeshift blanket while traveling or at chilly outdoor events.

data.name: Stylish Handbag
data.description: A functional and fashionable handbag, available in various styles and sizes to suit your needs.A stylish handbag is more than just a place to carry your essentials; it's an extension of your personal style and can elevate any outfit.
data.details: Leather is a classic choice, offering durability and timeless style. Pockets, compartments, and closures all contribute to functionality. Choose a bag with features that suit your needs to keep you organized.

data.name: Luxury Sneakers
data.description: A pair of high-end sneakers from a popular brand. Comfortable and stylish, perfect for everyday wear or athletic activities.Luxury sneakers are a unique blend of high fashion and athletic performance. They are crafted from premium materials, often featuring collaborations with renowned designers or limited-edition releases
data.details: Material: leather,  Luxury sneakers often feature intricate details, unique design elements, and superior construction techniques.  Meticulous stitching, innovative cushioning systems, and soles designed for both comfort and style are all hallmarks of luxury sneakers

data.name: Diamond Stud Earrings
data.description: A timeless and elegant pair of diamond stud earrings. Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.Available in various sizes to suit your style.Diamond stud earrings are classic and versatile pieces of jewelry.
data.details: Diamond Grading Reports: Reputable retailers will provide a diamond grading report from a gemological institute like GIA (Gemological Institute of America) or AGS (American Gem Society). This report details the diamond's carat weight, cut, clarity, and color.Consider the type of earring back, such as screw backs for added security or push backs for easier wear.

data.name: Gold Hoop Earrings
data.description: A classic and versatile pair of gold hoop earrings.Gold hoop earrings can have a high-shine polished finish, a brushed matte finish, or even a textured finish. Choose a finish that complements your style.
data.details: Gold Type: Yellow gold is the classic choice.Hoop Diameter: This refers to the width of the hoop, ranging from small (15mm)

data.name: Pearl Necklace
data.description: A sophisticated and elegant pearl necklace. Adds a touch of class to any outfit.Pearl necklaces are timeless and elegant pieces of jewelry, perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit.
data.details: Akoya Pearls: Known for their high luster and near-perfect round shape, these are classic white or cream-colored pearls.Necklace Length:around 14 inches

data.name: Layered Pendant Necklace
data.description: A trendy and stylish layered pendant necklace. Perfect for adding a touch of personality to your look.A layered pendant necklace is a trendy jewelry piece that combines multiple strands with different pendants, creating a stylish and textured look. It offers endless possibilities for customization and self-expression.
data.details: Layered pendant necklaces often combine different metals like gold and silver or incorporate materials like pearls, gemstones, or beads. This adds visual texture and allows you to match the necklace to various jewelry pieces.

data.name: Gold Tennis Bracelet
data.description: A timeless and luxurious gold tennis bracelet. A staple piece for any jewellery collection.A gold tennis bracelet is a timeless and sophisticated piece of jewelry that adds a touch of elegance and sparkle to any wrist.
data.details: Gold Type:yellow,Gold Karat:18k,The most popular cut for diamond tennis bracelets is the round brilliant cut. This cut maximizes sparkle and fire, creating a dazzling display.

data.name: Charm Bracelet
data.description: A personalized and sentimental charm bracelet. You can add or remove charms to create your own unique piece.A charm bracelet is a delightful and sentimental piece of jewelry that tells your story through a collection of trinkets and charms. It's more than just an ornament; it's a personalized treasure trove of memories and experiences
data.details: Luxury Charms: Designer brands and high-end jewelers offer luxury charms crafted from precious metals and gemstones, adding a touch of exclusivity to your braceletThis allows you to find a bracelet that complements your personal style and can be dressed up or down for any occasion..

data.name: Men's Leather Watch with Silver Accents
data.description: A stylish and sophisticated men's watch with a leather band and silver accents. Perfect for everyday wear or dressier occasions.Men's leather watches with silver accents are a timeless and versatile option. They can be dressed up or down, making them suitable for any occasion.
data.details: Style:There are many different styles of men's leather watches available, from classic dress watches to sporty chronographs.Strap Material: Leather is a popular choice for watch straps because it is comfortable, stylish, and durable. Case Size: The case size of the watch should be proportionate to the size of your wrist.

data.name: Delicate Silver Necklace
data.description: A dainty and feminine silver necklace. Perfect for layering with other pieces or wearing on its own.A delicate silver necklace is a versatile and timeless piece of jewelry that adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any outfit.
data.details: Silver Purity: Delicate necklaces are usually made from sterling silver, which is 92.5% silver and 7.5% other metals for added strength and durability.These are the hallmark of a delicate necklace.

data.name: Statement Cocktail Ring
data.description: A bold and eye-catching cocktail ring. Exact details and starting bid will be confirmed upon inspection.A statement cocktail ring is a bold and eye-catching piece of jewelry designed to be the star of the show. It's more than just an accessory; it's a conversation starter and a way to express your unique style
data.details: Eye-Catching Materials: Cocktail rings are not shy about using eye-catching materials. From bold colored gemstones like emeralds, rubies, and sapphires to unique cuts like pear-shaped diamonds or baguette diamonds, these rings are designed to grab attention.

data.name: Gemstone Bracelet
data.description: A beautiful and unique bracelet featuring a variety of gemstones. Select gem types may vary.A gemstone bracelet is a dazzling and versatile piece of jewelry that adds a touch of color, light, and personality to your wrist.
data.details: From bold colored gemstones like emeralds, rubies, and sapphires to unique cuts like pear-shaped diamonds or baguette diamonds, these are designed to grab attention
